data.eml:eml: Trichoribates sidorchukae sp. nov. (Acari, Oribatida, Ceratozetidae) from tropical montane Ecuador, with revised generic diagnosis

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Behan-Pelletier, Valerie M., Ermilov, Sergey G. (2019): Trichoribates sidorchukae sp. nov. (Acari, Oribatida, Ceratozetidae) from tropical montane Ecuador, with revised generic diagnosis. Zootaxa 4647 (1): 348-361, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.21
